title: Dolce Cielo
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Bakery, European, German
description: Bakery and chocolate shop also offering brunch menu (ask for details). Makes multiple vegan items including creamy cakes, pralines, chocolate fondue, waffles, ciabattas, ice cream soup, and more. On Saturday, a large all-you-can-eat buffet is offered with mostly vegan food. Also serves cocoa and coffee drinks, available as vegan with soy milk.
